original_text: He may escape from a soldier who has an iron sword. But then a soldier will shoot a bronze arrow into him. He may escape from a soldier who has an iron sword. But then a soldier will shoot a bronze arrow into him. He may escape from a soldier who has an iron sword.
korean_text: 그가 철 병기를 피할 때에는 놋화살을 쏘아 꿰뚫을 것이요

sentences.original_text: He may escape from a soldier
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 군인에게서 도망칠 수 있을지 몰라도

sentences.original_text: But then a soldier will shoot
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그러면 한 군인이 쏠 것이다
